replies.reviewContent: We can’t thank you enough for the kind words about [product/service]. Your review means a lot to us and lets us know we’re on the right track!
Dear Hur Abbas, Thank you so much for your kind words. Please recommend our products to your friends and family, We would love to make your experience more exciting.

items.reviewContent:
After comparing a few imported ones and LG I used, must say it's a massive disappointment.

* The Built quality is focused on the spinner, motor and looks of interface panel. 
* Side body, base cover, wheels (are literally cheapest possible) and I really hated the wheels quality. 
* It's not about the cost but the QC of the product.
* Even the packing carton isn't the three layered strong one. 
* Seriously, developers know it very well. Cheap stickers too
* This machine can not be moved for basic adjustment in washing bay. it has to be picked up and than moved, moreover there are only two button type wheels on a flimsy cheap metal rod, the front two ones are adjustable length plastic knobs. 
* Why there is an advertisement sticker of a detergent brand on Dawlance?
* There are no spare pipes, hoses or even wheels. Even when these are of basic cheap quality.

*Above show the care a brand exhibits for its customers. It's my review n subjective.i don't recommend this. Not worthy of claims.
items.itemTitle: Dawlance 12 kg Fully Automatic Top Load Washing Machine DWT 270 LVS+ Low Voltage Startup Series

items.reviewContent:
I hv bought this product. ..after 6 days i recieved my order finally..but Ma Sha Allah machine is so good colour and quality wise.first i had another locally available famous brand automatic machine but dawalance automatic machine is much better.washing result is good.my previously used automatic machine was was durable but washing result was not good.i appreciat the quality. Before purchase i took reviews from 5 to 6 people
who were using dawalance automatic machine and everyone recommended. But i suggest there should more options to buy larger capacity machine tub wise..means this is the biggest size in dawlance. 15 kg should also available. So that u can wash double blanket in it.overall so good.thank u dawalance. I hope it will durable also like my dawalance fridge. Which i m using from 13 years..
